title: Bangalore Tech Summit 2025
description: Karnataka's biggest tech summit featuring AI, Cloud Computing, and IoT innovations. Network with 5000+ tech professionals and attend workshops by industry leaders from top IT companies.

title: Sunburn Arena ft. Alan Walker
description: Experience the ultimate EDM night with international DJ Alan Walker. Dance to the biggest hits under the stars with world-class sound and lighting setup.

title: Bangalore Food Festival
description: Taste authentic Karnataka cuisine, street food from across India, and international delicacies. Meet celebrity chefs and attend live cooking demonstrations.

title: Stand-Up Comedy Night - Kenny Sebastian
description: Laugh your heart out with Kenny Sebastian's latest comedy special. An evening filled with hilarious observations about Bangalore life, tech culture, and everyday humor.

title: Startup Networking Meetup
description: Connect with entrepreneurs, investors, and innovators from Bangalore's thriving startup ecosystem. Pitch your ideas and explore collaboration opportunities.

title: Bangalore Marathon 2025
description: Join 10,000+ runners in Bangalore's biggest marathon event. Choose from 5K, 10K, or full marathon categories and run through the city's iconic landmarks.

title: Yoga & Wellness Retreat
description: One-day wellness retreat featuring yoga sessions, meditation workshops, and Ayurvedic wellness consultations. Rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul.
